New Records: Jackson Chourio has tied the third-most games with at least 4 RBI in a single National League season by a player younger than 21
Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a grand slam in the sixth inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Milwaukee Brewers are in contention for the No. 1 overall seed in the National League playoffs
Others: The Brewers will take on the Cardinals again on Tuesday at 7:40 p.m. ET
